20101217163804.333|20101217163806.000|CCO|WE ONLY HAD $50.
20101217163806.000|20101217163807.667|CCO|I HAD TO MULTIPURPOSE HERE.
20101217163807.667|20101217163809.333|CCO|WE TOOK THE MANILA FOLDERS AND 
20101217163809.333|20101217163811.000|CCO|MADE THEM INTO CONES.
20101217163811.000|20101217163813.000|CCO|AND TYKE TINSEL, THAT WAS CHEAP,
20101217163813.000|20101217163815.000|CCO|AND HOT GLUE, MADE SOME TREES.
20101217163815.000|20101217163817.000|CCO|THIS WAS A FUN PROJECT.
20101217163817.000|20101217163819.000|CCO|WE TOOK PEPPERMINT, PUT IT IN 
20101217163819.000|20101217163821.000|CCO|THE OVEN.
20101217163821.000|20101217163823.500|CCO|PUT THE PEPPERMENT INSIDE OF A
